column4: does anyone have any idea why does Jaunty load Gnome with blurry fonts with compiz enabled? The only workaround I found is temporary and it involves turning off desktop effects and re-enabling right after. The problem is that this fix won't survive a reboot. Any clues?
maybe you have the blur plugin enabled? Look around compizconfig-settings-manager
the blur plugin is turned off. If I turn off desktop effects and turn back on then it displays fonts as it should.
without changing anything in compiz settings
your's is new to me, try filing a bug report on it.
